Description:
The Botanical Gardens of Cockatoo
You could be mistaken for thinking you'd stumbled across a secret botanic garden. Seeing is believing with this dual access, ¾ of an acre flat block and entry level or downsize home. Bliss out and connect with your best self, surrounded by nature. Situated within walking distance to the new supermarket, you can take the path across the creek and through the fantastic Alma Treloar reserve playground.
The sun drenched front garden landscaped with natives, is the perfect place for the children to take their first steps or play in the sandpit. Adults can enjoy evenings around the fire pit or watching the sunset through the trees from the veranda with bistro blinds.
Charming double front doors welcome you into this solid brick home. Entirely renovated with the beauty of the natural world mirrored in the finishes. The contemporary kitchen features concrete benchtops, stainless steel appliances and an island bench. The lounge area is the perfect place to retreat to when the nights draw in.
The master bedroom with BIR allows you to soak up the beauty of the gums and tree ferns. Sunshine illuminates the single bedroom with BIR. The third bedroom is accessed off the veranda and would also make a perfect studio or study. From every window the garden calls to you.
The backyard is fully fenced and full of delights including a pristine forest with local wildflowers. Gardeners will delight in the large vegetable patch and orchard with three bay compost system. There is an abundance of fruit trees; olives, mulberry, apricots, and cherries. A rainbow of rhododendrons give a continual show through the spring. The attractive wooden workshop contains a blacksmith forge offering you a surprising chance to take up a new hobby.
Come and forge your future at the open day.

Description:
Country Style in Cockatoo
A stones' throw from Cockatoo Township, this home is tucked away on a quiet street but is close to main roads for easy access to amenities. Positioned upon a sun-filled garden, this cottage style Hardiplank home is a perfect family package. Light and indoor/outdoor living area are major highlights. The porch welcomes you home, with the front door opening to the living and dining area. Light streams through large windows and day/night blinds in the bedrooms provide shade or blackout as required. Floorboards through the hallways and living spaces add to the country feel and both bathrooms are tiled with terracotta. All bedrooms are carpeted and include built-in robes. Feature windows add character, including a servery to the deck. The kitchen has recent updates to the appliances including new dishwasher, induction cook-top, range hood and a wine fridge. The second living area provides further space, whilst two full bathrooms provide convenience for an expanding family. Drinks and al fresco meals can be enjoyed on the large west-facing, sun-bathed deck overlooking the garden on Summer evenings. Heating options are a cosy wood heater central to the home and gas ducted heating which has recently been upgraded.
The fully fenced, gently sloping garden down to the Puffing Billy line has thoughtful planting from the front to the back, providing privacy with greenery around much of the fencing. Trees include established ferns, olive and fruit trees - apple, plum and lemon. A sunny veggie patch is in the ideal sunny spot and flowers around the house add to the country feel. A separate building outside has potential for a studio, workshop, man-cave or teenage retreat. Ample garden shedding neatly tucks away the garden tools and fire wood. Plans for a double carport have been approved by council and are available to interested buyers.
With little left to do, this property is ready to move into and enjoy this Summer!
*Photo ID required for inspections. The Agent reserves the right to refuse entry to the property during an inspection.*

Description:
Multiple Accommodation on 24 Private Acres
A truly unique opportunity, 24 private acres situated between Cockatoo and Gembrook approximately 10 acres of pasture with the remaining 14 acres of stunning native bush. The iconic Puffing Billy tracks run along the north side of the property giving you the perfect view of this much loved tourist attraction!
Located on this acreage are three residences:
1. One bedroom cottage with kitchen, living area, split system and single carport.
2. Two bedroom cottage with open plan kitchen, dining & living area, bathroom/laundry, sun room, GDH and split system.
3. Large ex-army barrack (circa 1940s) that renovations have been commenced on but remains a perfect shell ready to create the home of your dreams. A double carport is attached to this residence.
The residences are all connected via garden paths that ramble through stunning cottage style gardens. These gardens are well established and have been lovingly planted and maintained. A definite feature of this property, these gardens are filled with an array of colourful blooms and plants Blue Bells, Freshias, Salvias, Magnolias, Maples, Rhododendrons, Azaleas and Camellias.
Other features of this property:
Large vegetable garden
Garden pond
Water tanks
Multiple sheds
The one bedroom cottage is separately metered to the other two residences
Mains gas
Mains power
Dual access into property
3 large fenced paddocks
Wonderful views
Close to Gembrook & Cockatoo townships
Adjacent to Emerald - Gembrook walking/cycling track
Easy access to Pakenham
This unique property is a must see.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Great Home, Great Location!
Youll fall in love with this charming character home, nestled privately behind a beautiful established garden featuring soft tree ferns, camellias and Daphne. Set on a usable ¼ acre block, this home is perfectly located just an easy 500m stroll to Cockatoo PS and has a bus stop just 25m from the door step.
The entry hallway has floor to ceiling library and leads to two of the four spacious bedrooms. The other two bedrooms are zoned at the rear of the home and include the Master with a walk in robe and ensuite. The layout of the other bedroom at the rear of the home is versatile can be used as a office, music room or studio. The huge kitchen with energy efficient gas appliances provides plenty of space for the chef in the family to cook up a storm, then spend quality time with family and friends in the meals area sharing stories and memories. The generous living area includes a large glass sliding door opening this living space to the outside. The family bathroom with corner spa, large laundry and separate toilet caters for the needs of a family.
A large covered deck is the ideal place to relax while watching the kids and pets playing in the fully fenced sunlit backyard which has plenty of room amongst the mature trees, vegetable garden beds and garden shed.
Other features of this light filled home included polished floorboards, neutral tones throughout, character dado wall panelling, ceiling fans, large windows, gas ducted heating and double carport.
A lovely neat home perfectly located makes this a great first home, investment or family home!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Space, Comfort and Great Location!
Pretty gardens and a neat hedge lined path welcome you to this tidy 4 bedroom family home situated on ½ acre in a prime location in Cockatoo.
Polished floorboards, 9 ceilings, decorative archways and wide wrap around verandah adds country charm to this home. This home has plenty of space for family members with four bedrooms, the Master with a WIR and ensuite which is zoned away from the other bedrooms.
The country style kitchen features stylish white cupboards, timber benchtops and contemporary subway tiles. With ample bench space and a large pantry, preparing meals for family and friends will be a pleasure. The breakfast bench connects the kitchen to the meals meals area and has a wood fire heater to create a cosy ambience in the cooler months. The spacious living area is ideal for the family to relax and enjoy.
Gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling will ensure your climate comfort throughout the year.
Outside the features and flexibility of this home continue with a separate studio which is ideal as a guest room, home office or teenager retreat. The large 7 x 7m shed at the rear of the property has a concrete floor & bar and is situated next to a parking area perfect for trailers or caravans. Fully fenced and plenty of yard means kids and furbabies can play safely all day.
Close to Cockatoo township this home offers space, comfort and location!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
BRING YOUR IMAGINATION AND REAP THE BENEFITS ON OVER ONE ACRE
Positioned in a quiet and leafy no through road, and only minutes from the Cockatoo shops, schools and public transport and a short walk to the sport reserve is this very unique rendered straw bale home with a very flexible and functional floor plan, and an abundance of possibilities. The home consists of four very spacious bedrooms, master and ensuite positioned for privacy on the lower level and the additional three bedrooms on the upper level with a huge rumpus /games room, an additional living area, main bathroom and two extra mezzanine storage spaces. The kitchen, meals and living area is open plan and positioned on the lower level enjoying an outlook that will make you feel the connection to the greenery outdoors from every angle. Most of the hard work is done but you can complete this project with your choice of finishes and end up with a show stopping one of a kind home. If you have been looking for something to add your own flair to, this is just what you have been waiting for.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
BAYHILL A BEAUTIFUL HOME WITH VIEWS ON 2506m2
Built for the current owners and set on a completely useable block of over 1/2 an acre this beautiful home is surrounded by landscaped gardens and is admired by all. Custom built to the highest standard the home features polished hardwood floors, ornate plasterwork, spacious rooms, picture windows and wrap around verandas. There are two living areas, one is big enough for the whole family to spread out and enjoy and provides open plan design to the meals area and kitchen. Classic modern style in the kitchen includes Caesarstone benches, loads of drawers and cupboards, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and 900mm gas hot plates and pyrolytic oven. French doors lead out to the covered outdoor area from this section of the home and there are also doors out from the separate rumpus room/second living room providing the ideal indoor/outdoor space for every occasion. This area has played host to many happy celebrations and is perfect for a barbeque with friends and family while you watch the Grand Final. There are four bedrooms plus a study, the fourth bedroom has its own entry and is currently used as a work from home space. The master bedroom is serviced by an ensuite and walk in robe and has French doors to access the alfresco area where Sunday brunch can be enjoyed. Ducted heating, split system, an abundance of storage and easy access into the roof space are added extras. Outdoors an in/out driveway, side access to the rear yard and oversized remote garage, sealed road access and a view of twinkling lights out to the Bay completes a picture perfect property.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead!

Description:
Amazing 1 Acre Block & Sensational Location with a Huge 3 Bedroom Home - the Potential is Endless!
This Western Red Cedar home is set back off the road on a deep 1 acre block with plenty of room for a drive to the rear & the shed of your dream (STCA) - so you are assured of both space and privacy, yet you are so close to Cockatoo Township that you can see it from your front gate.
The central hub of this home provides a lovely feeling of space and light with soaring high pitched timber ceilings and large windows allowing natural light to flood in. This zone contains a spacious kitchen overlooking the meals area and generous family room complete with a cosy wood fire heater. The separate rumpus room provides additional space any family will love and the zoned floor plan places the main robed bedroom at one end of the home and the two remaining robed bedrooms at the other. Also features gas ducted heating, easy care tiled floor and an air conditioner for the ultimate in comfort.
Outside you have under house storage and gardens that are just waiting for your style and love to make it bloom!
Properties of this land size so close to amenities are hard to come by and this one won't last long.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
LEMONTHYME. Quality Built Handcrafted Home.
Surrounded by magnificent gardens, and set on a picturesque and park like ½ acre is this meticulously maintained family home, oozing both country character and charm. Quality built and complemented by high ceilings throughout, decorative cornices, vents and ceiling roses, high skirting boards, dado paneling, and lead light feature doors. There are 4 bedrooms with the spacious master suite serviced by a full ensuite and walk in robe. There is a study zoned for privacy, located at one end of the home and the additional 3 bedrooms to the other, making the home ideal for a growing family. The kitchen is centrally located and features Caesar stone benches, Miele appliances, large corner pantry, and overlooks an open plan meals and living area featuring French doors, double hung bay window, and is warmed by a large solid fuel heater, as well as having ducted heating throughout the home. The separate formal lounge provides the perfect space for entertaining with a cosy open fire place, and offers amazing views to the stunning front gardens that features year round colour from Cherry blossoms, Camellias, Rhododendrons, Magnolias, Japanese Maples and Silver Birches. Outside you will find a sealed driveway to a huge remote double lock up garage, with work area as well a great ceiling storage space and a garden shed that provides additional storage. The rear garden is fully fenced and is perfect for outdoor entertaining with a private alfresco area and lots of great space for the family to enjoy. Lemonthyme boasts a quality built handcrafted home, and proudly sits on a useable 1/2 acre with magnificent mature landscaped gardens. An Exceptional Property!

Description:
Quaint and Private Cottage
*** OPEN FOR INSPECTION CANCELLED ***
Quaint and full of character, this 3 bedroom Miners Cottage on just under ½ acre provides a quiet retreat amongst the towering gums and lush fern gully. Painted in traditional heritage colours, the double level home has a front verandah entry overlooking the rich green surrounding landscape.
Enter into a spacious living area complete with a cosy wood fire heater, perfect for the cooler months. The timber kitchen includes an island bench and a spacious butlers pantry. Polished floorboards connect the kitchen with the light filled meals area which overlooks the mature tree ferns towering up from below.
On the upper level youll also find a bedroom and the traditionally styled family bathroom which includes a cast iron clawfoot bathtub. The lower level contains the third bedroom and the Master bedroom with a large walk in robe and ensuite. This home also includes gas console heater and split system. The block allows you to immerse yourself with nature and includes a babbling seasonal creek.
There is so much potential with this home and is just waiting for someone to bring out its former glory.

Description:
ULTIMATE HIDEAWAY
This ranch style brick home is nestled on just under a third of an acre in a quite tranquil setting.
Boasting 3 spacious living areas there is plenty of room for all the family to enjoy. This property features 3 spacious bedrooms with master suite complete with walk in robe and en-suite.
Spacious country style kitchen in the heart of the home opening out onto a large outdoor entertaining deck to enjoy with all your family and friends whilst the kids escape downstairs to a large rumpus/games room. This elevated home offers sweeping verandas to enjoy the natural setting and to soak in all that natural beauty. Outside there are established landscaped grounds
complete with approx 73 Sqm shed with 3 phase power approx. 485 sq carport and double garage and 4 car carport. So if you are a tradie, handyman, car or horse enthusiast, caravan or boat owner then this property has you covered!
Come see for yourself
You wont be disappointed

Description:
The Ultimate Hills Escape
Space, peace, privacy and shedding provide the perfect accompaniments to this bright weatherboard. Located in an area many have described as Cockatoo Upper, a stone's throw from Mountain Road Reserve.
The heart of the home is the large country style kitchen with gas cooking, plenty of cupboard space & room to groove. The adjoining dining & living areas allow you to keep an eye on the kids as they play and enjoy the bushland views beyond the garden through the floor to ceiling windows. A wood fire for those cold winter nights warms the open plan space and gas ducted heating throughout.
All of the three bedrooms are roomy. The master bedroom has a large walk-in robe & direct access to the front veranda. The generous bathroom with feature sash stained-glass windows, shower and an inviting freestanding bath.
Step outside and you will discover a large full-length veranda for morning coffees, afternoon teas or evening drinks. From here, enjoy the views of the fern gully, a raised veggie patch, chicken coup, a 6 x 4 colourbond workshop/studio and a large carport with electric roller door.
Parking a plenty with a circular drive for convenience.
To enjoy this rare and unique home on this magnificent property with bush surroundings call today!
Insights: 6-8 Waratah Way, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2019 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT OPPORTUNITY IN THE HEART OF TOWN
Privately positioned within walking distance to the township of Cockatoo is this lovely brick home offering an abundance of possibilities that are only limited by your imagination.
The home provides a very flexible and functional floorplan, with 3 spacious bedrooms, the master bedroom offers a semi ensuite and large walk in robe and the other bedrooms both have built in robes. There is a spacious living area and formal dining area. The central kitchen offers plenty of bench space, gas cooking and plenty of natural light flooding through. Your comfort is assured with split system heating and cooling.
Outside boasts a completely useable allotment of 1/4 of an acre with garden shed and wood storage, rear covered entertaining area, established gardens, large lawn areas and a double carport. Situated just a short stroll to the highly regarded Primary School and within easy reach of the bus stop this is a property that will make Hills living easy. Call today, inspection is a must.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Neat, Tidy and Ready to Enjoy!
Situated on a just under quarter acre of flat, usable land, this beautifully presented home is full of character and is just a short drive to Cockatoo main street. Set over two levels, the home has 3 bedrooms, 2 located upstairs in the cosy loft along with a sizable rumpus room with master bedroom downstairs.
The open plan living area features polished floorboard, timber lined walls and ceilings and consists of a generous lounge, dining area and stylish light filled kitchen. The home chef will appreciate cooking up a treat in this spacious kitchen featuring a 900mm 6 burner gas cooktop, double pantry, ample bench space and abundant storage space.
From the main living area, step outside onto the large north facing entertaining deck where you can sit back and relax at the end of a busy day. This is the perfect place to enjoy your favourite drink as you look out onto the flat backyard where kids and fur babies have loads of room to play. The low maintenance gardens will ensure you can enjoy your time at home with friends and family, and there is plenty of space to park cars, trailers or caravans.
So why wait any longer first home buyers, young families or downsizers will appreciate this wonderful home where all the hard work has been done.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Country Lifestyle On Almost 2 Acres!
This lovely property is surrounded by rolling green hills and is set in a quiet cul-de-sac. Set on just under 2 acres, the home features 3 bedrooms, fresh modern tones, bathroom with spa, quality kitchen with an adjoining meals area, lounge offering large windows that allows for plenty of natural light, polished hardwood floors, split system and a cosy wood fire heater. Outside has been set up for the tradesman with dual access, double garage with workshop, triple carport and plenty of open space. Also on offer is a pony paddock, orchard and a covered entertaining area. Call today your country lifestyle awaits!!!

Description:
Stunning, Private 30 Acres!
This private & peaceful vacant block is the epitome of serene whilst being only minutes away from Cockatoo Township & an easy drive to the Eastern Suburbs, Pakenham & the CBD.
Abundant with native wildlife & bird life it is a pleasure to explore this lovely flat & sunny block, walking or driving around the many tracks that exist on the property. As you drive or walk through the property you will notice the remnants of the original cottage and find many secluded places for your private lifestyle.
There is power & telephone available for connection in the street, or maybe build the dream, off grid home amongst nature (STCA).
There is also the opportunity to purchase the adjoining 41 acres to ensure your privacy & lifestyle.
This is an opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
WANT TO GET AWAY FROM IT ALL? HOUSE, STUDIO AND LARGE SHED
Situated on a quiet no-through road in a bushland setting, you can be at one with nature, yet enjoy the creature comforts of this immaculately presented home. Neat, well maintained and the perfect getaway, positioned on just over 1.5 acres of bushland with mown areas allowing for the wildlife to roam free.
This welcoming home has new carpet, raked ceilings, a large blackwood kitchen that features a dishwasher with attached dining and lounge, three spacious bedrooms, bathroom with bath and shower, laundry and separate toilet. Centrally located wood heating and a split system offer year-round comfort. You are sure to get plenty of use out of the spacious covered rear deck for BBQs and gatherings. Other features are separate bungalow/studio, sealed drive and huge 4 car shed with power and water and plenty of off street parking.
How fabulous to get out of the rat race, secure in this beautiful area with all that Cockatoo has to offer, its lifestyle and community. Looking forward to showing you through and assisting with this next stage of your lives, contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Light, Bright, Spacious & Walk to Everything - Great Investment or First Home !
Situated on an elevated block, the full length front verandah will give you a wonderful outlook across to a lush reserve and the iconic Puffing Billy railway track.
Walking into this split level home, you will have a wonderful sense of space with the stunning high cathedral ceilings and large windows which allow the natural light to flood in. The lower level contains 2 living areas, the lounge room with toasty wood fire & separate open plan dining room, kitchen and family room. The kitchen is good as new with ample storage, dishwasher, gas cook top and large pantry.
Walk a few steps up to the second level which contains the 3 spacious, robed bedrooms and family bathroom. With two double robes in the spacious Master youll never run out of space for your clothes and shoes! From the Master you also have access to the large family bathroom creating a semi ensuite layout.
Other features include mains gas ducted heating, floating floor, cosy carpet, large laundry and 3kw of solar power to save on those energy bills.
Outside you have the advantage of under-house storage, gardens out the front and a rear yard ready for you to develop how you wish. The rear yard is a private, blank canvas with plenty of space for kids & fur babies to run & play with the potential for extensive outdoor entertaining or a new shed maybe (STCA).
So if youre in the market for a great buy, dont hesitate to book your private inspection today!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY- Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
Room To Spare With This Dual Accommodation Property!
Situated between Cockatoo and Gembrook in a tranquil leafy street is this fantastic family home. With dual accommodation on just under a 1 acre block, this property offers space and functionality any family would love!
An inviting entry of flourishing established trees lead you to this well presented country style home featuring a full length verandah and character colonial windows.
Charming timber dado and slate floors flow through the first living zone comprising of the living area, family/meals area and large timber kitchen with its 5 burner gas cooktop, spacious pantry and bay window overlooking the amazing valley views beyond.
Space for all the family is assured with four robed bedrooms, the spacious Master with a walk in robe and ensuite. The second living zone includes a built in bar and glass doors which connects to the massive outdoor covered entertaining area complete with café blinds, built in BBQ, TV mount, gas heater and a large outdoor spa. Family gatherings at Christmas time or birthday celebrations will be so easy and stress free with this functional and comfortable entertaining area.
The luxury of space continues with a quality separate 2 bedroom (DPU) dwelling at the rear of this property. This additional accommodation offers large living area, split system, modern kitchen and full length verandah with ramps on both the front and rear of the home.
Additional features of this great property include gas ducted heating, ducted vacuum system, split system cooling, ceiling fans, 4 car carport attached to the main house, easy driveway access to both the main house and second accommodation, large powered shed/workshop, double carport and well-designed landscaped gardens which compliment this beautiful property while also providing privacy between the two homes.
This home is conveniently close to both Cockatoo and Gembrook townships. The young and young at heart will be thrilled as they hear the sounds of the much loved Puffing Billy as it passes just 150m away!
Inspect this wonderful property today!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Street Appeal on Steroids and Lo-Maintenance Lifestyle
This superb starter or downsizer is just one year young. A period styled brick home which offers ease of living whilst retaining the benefits of well established (flat) surrounds including an orange tree dripping with fruit.
A front deck with led lighting welcomes you into the property with high ceilings and sophisticated colour tones. Inside the spacious open plan living has all the comforts you would expect including plantation shutters and double blinds.
Featuring three great sized bedrooms, master boasting full ensuite and walk in robe, robed secondary bedrooms and a beautifully appointed gloss white kitchen with stainless steel appliances overlooking the living and dining zones, sliding doors open to reveal a decked outdoor sitting area with rustic bar that takes full advantage of the generous rear gardens with garden shed (plenty of space for play, extra vehicles, future shedding etc.)
Double carport with access to the back yard, ducted heating throughout.
The neighbourhood has under-gone a transformation in recent times becoming more like a street in the Hamptons than the Cockatoo of old. Close to the newly upgraded sporting facilities of Mountain Road Reserve that includes a basketball stadium, bootcamp style group fitness classes, cricket & footy ground, netball courts, athletics track, walking tracks and home to the Cockatoo Archery Club. Most school transport is available from here or nearby and Cockatoo township is just under 2kms away.
